summary: This mod allows you to Smelt Back Armor for Ingots.
descriptionHtml:
This mod allows you to Smelt Back Armor for the equivalent of the main building material.
To use this mod:

1. Drop in Data file in skyrim Directory
2. Enable it on skyrim launcher (Data Files Option)
3. Buy SmeltBack Perk on Smithing Tree.
4. Get a piece of armor that is craftable at a smihting forge
5. Go to a smelter and transfer it for equal value in Ingots
6. Have fun and spread it around :)
author: LonelyXD
